return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

notes.description:
Parts of the information displayed are disabled when the
    expose_php configuration setting
    is set to off. This includes the PHP and Zend logos,
    and the credits.

phpinfo outputs plain text instead of HTML when
    using the CLI mode.

changelog.change:
The "Loaded Configuration File" information was added, when before
        only "Configuration File (php.ini) Path" existed.
